text.text: Welcome to the third edition of Materials & You: Surviving the first day and beyond. Unlike the second edition, this book focuses in on tool crafting and tool types, and leaves topics such as modifiers to Further Reading.

If you are wondering about the changes in the newest version, check the "What's New" page, linked from GitHub or on the SlimeKnights Discord. Sadly I couldn't figure out links so I can't link them to you
